#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {   int n,x,y,z,x1=0,y1=0,z1=0;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        while(n--)
        {
            scanf("%d%d%d",&x,&y,&z);
            x1=x1+x;
            y1=y1+y;
            z1=z1+z;
            
            
        }
        
        if(x1==0 && y1==0 && z1==0)
         printf("YES\n");
         
        else
        printf("NO\n");
        
        
        
    }
    
  return 0;  
    
}
